APPLY

About Us

SWADESHINTERN is a devoted IT services and consultancy firm, specializing in pioneering business solutions. We are unwavering in our passion for technology and resolute in our belief in software's transformative potential. Our internship program is a testament to our holistic commitment to nurturing the industry's future.

Our core conviction is that practical knowledge is the cornerstone of triumph in the tech domain. At SWADESHINTERN, our primary mission is to empower students who may lack fundamental skills by offering immersive, hands-on learning opportunities through live projects and real-world practicality.

Internship

Web Development

Join our web development internship for hands-on experience, crafting and enhancing websites. Tackle real-world projects, gain practical skills, and be part of our innovative team, kickstarting your journey to success in a supportive, enriching environment

App development

Explore the power of Android, an open-source, user-friendly OS reshaping mobile tasks. At SWADESHINTERN, we're your gateway to app development. Start your app journey with ease and step into a world of limitless mobile innovation opportunities.

Data Science

Elevate your skills with remote Data Science internships, a unique opportunity in today's virtual workforce. Immerse yourself in a top-tier organization and stand out in this highly competitive and sought-after realm of data analysis internships.

Internet of Things(IOT)

Join our IoT internship for hands-on experience, developing and deploying IoT solutions. Tackle real-world projects, gain practical skills, and be part of our innovative team, embarking on a journey to success in a supportive, enriching environment.

Cyber Seurity

Join our cybersecurity internship for hands-on experience in securing digital assets. Tackle real-world security challenges, gain practical skills, and be part of our innovative team, launching your journey to success in a supportive, enriching environment.

Java Development

Master Java programming from home and enhance your career opportunities with our certification program. Join our 4-week internship for in-depth learning, covering web app development and Java deployment. Build a strong foundation through hands-on training in a supportive, collaborative environment.

Python Development

Elevate your Python skills with our 4-week remote internship program. Master programming fundamentals at home, opening doors to exciting job prospects. Learn web development and Python-based app deployment, and earn a valuable certification to boost your career. Don't miss your chance to excel in Python programming!

Artifcal Intelligence & Machine Learning

Achieve mastery in Artificial Intelligence from home with our 4-week certification program. Unlock exciting job opportunities as you delve into web app development and deployment. Build a solid career foundation with hands-on experience in a supportive, collaborative environment. Don't miss your chance to excel in AI!

UX and UI designer

Unlock the world of UI/UX Design with our 4-week remote certification program. Master it from home and access incredible job prospects. Dive into web app development and deployment, building a robust career foundation with real-world experience in a supportive, collaborative environment. Don't miss this opportunity to excel in UI/UX Design!

Our Features
01 Emai Notifications
The email notifications about important events, such as upcoming deadlines, new assignments, and changes to your schedule..
02 Simple Interface
The simplicity of the interface makes it easy to use and navigate. The information is presented in a clear and concise way.
03 Deadline Reminders
The reminders are sent to you in advance in our telegram channel and your email, so you have plenty of time to get your tasks done.
